quotes: Each path to knowledge involves different rules and these rules are not interchangeable.
Art is the signature of civilizations.
Live your life as an exclamation rather than an explanation.
It's better to have a short life that is full of what you like doing, than a long life spent in a miserable way.
It's very important to like the people you work with, otherwise life and your job is gonna be quite miserable.
The more acquaintances you have, the less you know them.
Every man's work, whether it be literature or music or pictures or architecture or anything else, is always a portrait of himself.
Real growth comes through intense, difficult, and challenging situations.
The wise accomplish all that they want without arousing the envy or scorn of others.
If you build the guts to do something, anything, then you better save enough to face the consequences.
Faults are yours to fix, not to curse.
Time goes from present to past.
Freeing oneself from words is liberation.
As one grows weaker one is less susceptible to suffering. There is less hurt because there is less to hurt.
Fiction is the truth inside the lie.
Better to die fighting for freedom than be a prisoner all the days of your life.
Make yourself so useful to other people, that they think you are irreplaceable.
Thinking is the hardest work there is, which is probably the reason why so few engage in it.
Information changes your mind. Action changes your circumstances.
Never let the fear of striking out keep you from playing the game.
You are not one person, but three: The one you think you are; The one others think you are; The one you really are.
Light a candle instead of cursing the darkness.
Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose.
Happiness is only real, when shared.
You do not read a book for the book's sake, but for your own.
Everything eaten is killed. Every meal is a sacrifice.
Faith means believing the unbelievable.
To find yourself, think for yourself.
Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
We are like islands in the sea, separate on the surface but connected in the deep.
Changing minds is harder than finding people who already agree.
Your work is to discover your work and then, with all your heart, to give yourself to it.
The saddest aspect of life is that there is no one on earth whose happiness is such that he won't sometimes wish he were dead rather than alive.
True wealth is of the heart, not of the purse.
The only way to ?find out if it will work out' is to do it.
So long as we are being remembered, we remain alive.
The moment you stop to think about whether you love someone, you've already stopped loving that person forever.
Empty your mind, be formless.
We tend to live up to our expectations.
However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
We turn not older with years but newer every day.
Words, once they are printed, have a life of their own.
Deliberately seek the company of people who influence you to think and act on building the life you desire.
One never does wrong by doing right.
The idea of ourselves is our escape from the fact of what we really are.
We are all self-made, but only the successful will admit it.
Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
A goal is a dream with a deadline.
Don't ever save anything for a special occasion. Being alive is the special occasion.
It is the nature of the wise to resist pleasures, but the foolish to be a slave to them.
